testsuite.name: Scenario: Privacy Policy Link

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
And I enable Privacy Policy Required with the dummy URL
Given I refresh the System Settings page
And I accept the privacy policy if necessary
When I verify the Privacy Policy link is visible
And I click the Privacy Policy link
Then I am on the Privacy Policy page
Given I navigate to the System Settings page
And I set Privacy Policy Required to false
And I set the Privacy Policy URL to ""
And I submit the changes to System Settings
Then The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
And The Privacy Policy Required is false
And I verify the Privacy Policy link is not visible
And I set Privacy Policy Required to false
When I set the Privacy Policy URL to be the dummy page
And I submit the changes to System Settings
Then The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
And The Privacy Policy Required is false
And I verify the Privacy Policy link is not visible
classMethod
